name: part_009
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ3D】尾丸ポルカ3Dお披露目するか！ポルカおるよ！【ホロライブ】 [GnW76d1A3YQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka completes a tightrope walk on a high wire.
The camera shifts to reveal Polka was actually just above the floor, and she reacts with confusion.
Polka celebrates the success and thanks the audience and the Zain-kun mascots.
Polka notices the spotlight following her and expresses amazement.
Zain-kun mascots start appearing and multiplying, confusing Polka.
The Zain-kuns grow giant, and Polka plays a "Where is Polka?" game while hidden among them.
Polka reveals herself, but the Zain-kuns continue to grow even larger.
Polka struggles to be seen among the massive Zain-kuns before they start shrinking as time runs out.

subtitles.original: な、大成功ー！
subtitles.english: Wh- A great success!

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: せーの、大成功ー！
subtitles.english: Ready, a great success!

subtitles.original: わーいぱちぱちぱちぱち！
subtitles.english: Yay! Clap clap clap clap!

subtitles.original: それそれそれそれ、それ待ってた。
subtitles.english: That's it, that's what I was waiting for.

subtitles.original: いや、しかしこれ、高いな...
subtitles.english: Man, but this is high...

subtitles.original: これ、ヤバくね？
subtitles.english: Isn't this crazy?

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: え？今まで見てたのは何だったの？
subtitles.english: What? What was I looking at until now?

subtitles.original: え？ちょ、あの、え？え？今だって、下に高いのが...
subtitles.english: What? Wait, um, what? What? Just now, there was something high below...

subtitles.original: 夢？え？
subtitles.english: A dream? Huh?

subtitles.original: え、みんな見て...え？え？え？え？今、夢を...え？
subtitles.english: Everyone was watching... what? What? What? What? Was I just dreaming?

subtitles.original: 夢を見てたの？今までだって、すごい綱渡りが...
subtitles.english: Was I dreaming? Because up until now, there was a great tightrope walk...

subtitles.original: あれ？どういうこと？
subtitles.english: Huh? What does this mean?

subtitles.original: だって今、踊ってポルカ、このままじゃ死んじゃうよ...
subtitles.english: Because just now, dancing Polka was like, "I'm gonna die at this rate..."

subtitles.original: 明日から配信なくなっちゃうよ、
subtitles.english: "My streams will be gone from tomorrow,

subtitles.original: マリオカート大会も出られないよ、いいの？ってなってたの。
subtitles.english: I won't even be able to enter the Mario Kart tournament, is that okay?"

subtitles.original: まあ、何はともあれ大成功でしたー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, it was a great success! Yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ、ヤッホー！あははは！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yahoo! Ahahaha!

subtitles.original: まあ、こんなポルカサーカスだけど、これからもよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Well, even with a Polka Circus like this, I look forward to your continued support.

subtitles.original: え、楽しかった？
subtitles.english: Hey, did you have fun?

subtitles.original: 色々ね、用意したんだ。
subtitles.english: I prepared all sorts of things.

subtitles.original: 座員くんも頑張ってたし、ポルカも頑張んないと。
subtitles.english: The Zain-kuns worked hard too, so Polka has to work hard as well.

subtitles.original: え、何でそんな侘びられるの？
subtitles.english: Eh? Why am I being thanked like that?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ頑張ったよ、どや、どや！
subtitles.english: I worked really hard, you know! How about that?

subtitles.original: どやー！
subtitles.english: Look at me!

subtitles.original: よかった楽しかったんなら。ありがと、へい！
subtitles.english: I'm glad if you had fun. Thanks! Hey!

subtitles.original: へい、よしよしよし。
subtitles.english: Hey! Good job, good job.

subtitles.original: さてと、お、なんだい？お、このスポットライトさ、ちゃんとポルカに合わせて動いてる！
subtitles.english: Well now, oh, what is it? Oh, this spotlight is actually moving along with Polka!

subtitles.original: 今気づいた！ピンスポありがと！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: I just noticed! Thanks for the pin spot! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: すげーな。
subtitles.english: Amazing.

subtitles.original: え、ってことはさ、これ、これ...動いてくれてる！
subtitles.english: Hey, so that means, this, this... it's moving for me!

subtitles.original: よし、よし、よし、よし、はい！
subtitles.english: Good, good, good, good, yes!

subtitles.original: え、あ、お、生まれてきた！可愛い！
subtitles.english: Eh? Ah! Oh! They're being born! So cute!

subtitles.original: 可愛い、これさ、なんか...え、なんか君どこから来たの？
subtitles.english: So cute. This... wait, where did you come from?

subtitles.original: 君、どこから来た？どこに...うわぁ！生まれた！
subtitles.english: Where did you come from? Where are you... Whoa! Another was born!

subtitles.original: 君はどこから来たの？いい子だねー。
subtitles.english: Where did you come from? Good boy.

subtitles.original: あ、あ、そんな引かないで引かないで、どうしたの？
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, don't back away, don't back away. What's wrong?

subtitles.original: な、大事、何も、何もしない、怖いこと何もしないから、どうしたの？
subtitles.english: It's okay, I'm not doing anything. I'm not doing anything scary, so what's wrong?

subtitles.original: いい子ね、せっかくね、一緒にね、ここまで来たんだからね、
subtitles.english: Good boy. Since we've come this far together,

subtitles.original: これからも一緒にやってこうね。ね？ね？
subtitles.english: let's keep going together from now on. Right? Right?

subtitles.original: 座員くんは喋らないんです。え？
subtitles.english: The Zain-kuns don't speak. Eh?

subtitles.original: 座員くん喋って、ほらほら、ほら、お、あれ？あれ？あれ？
subtitles.english: Speak, Zain-kun! Come on, come on. Oh? Huh? Huh?

subtitles.original: ちょ、ちょっと待って。え、何でそっち行っちゃうの？
subtitles.english: Wa- Wait a second. Why are you going over there?

subtitles.original: 上手く操作できねーぜ、座員が。俺座長なのに！
subtitles.english: I can't control the Zain-kuns very well. Even though I'm the ringmaster!

subtitles.original: ちょ、あ、こ、こ、こ、こ、え、え、もうわかんないよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, ah, th- th- th- th- what? What? I don't get this anymore!

subtitles.original: 座員のこと全然わかんない、お、お、お、お、お！
subtitles.english: I don't understand the Zain-kuns at all! Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh!

subtitles.original: デカいデカいデカいデカい！説明不要すごい！
subtitles.english: They're big, big, big, big! No explanation needed, amazing!

subtitles.original: これはデカすぎる！何で？
subtitles.english: This is too big! Why?

subtitles.original: ちょ、待って待って待って、飲み込まれるこのままじゃ！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, wait. I'm gonna get swallowed at this rate!

subtitles.original: ヤバい、あの、ポルカのお披露目なんです今日。
subtitles.english: This is bad. Um, today is Polka's debut.

subtitles.original: はい、ポルカはどこにいるでしょうかゲーム！
subtitles.english: Okay, the "Where is Polka?" game!

subtitles.original: ポルカはどこにいるでしょうかゲーム！
subtitles.english: The "Where is Polka?" game!

subtitles.original: ポルカはここです！イエーイ！わかったかな？
subtitles.english: Polka is right here! Yay! Did you figure it out?

subtitles.original: お前らこんな巨大化もできるんだな、初めて知った。
subtitles.english: You guys can even grow that big, huh? I didn't know that.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとさこれ、座員くんちょっと、えーい！
subtitles.english: Wait, look at this. Zain-kun, just... Hup!

subtitles.original: あ、もっとデカくなった！
subtitles.english: Oh, he got even bigger!

subtitles.original: ヤバい待って、あ、ここすごい、じゅう...ぎゃー！何！？
subtitles.english: This is bad, wait. Ah, this is intense. Cr- Gyaa! What!?

subtitles.original: ちょっと！ここ、ポルカここ、ここ、あっ、痛っ、
subtitles.english: Wait! Here! Polka is here! Here! Ow!

subtitles.original: ここ、ここ、ここ。
subtitles.english: Here! Here! Here!

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ？座員くんにスポットライト、あの、え、見えろ、こっちか、どっちだ？
subtitles.english: Huh? Huh? The spotlight is on Zain-kun. Um, wait, let me be seen. Is it this way? Which way is it?

subtitles.original: ちょ、あの、あった、いたいた、
subtitles.english: Wait, um, found it! There I am!

subtitles.original: あっ、ここここ、ここここ。
subtitles.english: Ah, here, here, here, here!

subtitles.original: や、こちらはね、あの、みんなの魔法の力で座員くん増えてるから...
subtitles.english: Well, you see, the Zain-kuns are multiplying thanks to everyone's magic...

subtitles.original: あっ、ちょ、まだここ空いてるよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, wait, there's still a spot open here.

subtitles.original: まだここ空いてるよ、まだここ空いてるよ...
subtitles.english: There's still a spot here, still a spot here...

subtitles.original: あー！空いてないよー！
subtitles.english: Aah! There's no spot!

subtitles.original: くっ、こ、あ、あー！何で、まだいける、まだいける。
subtitles.english: Ugh, th- Ah, aah! Why? I can still do it, I can still do it.

subtitles.original: あー、ふぅ、え？あ、だんだんちっちゃく...
subtitles.english: Ah... Phew. Huh? Oh, they're gradually getting smaller...

subtitles.original: あ、もうそろそろ時間だよ座長、って教えてくれてるんだ。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Oh, they're telling me, "It's almost time, ringmaster." Thank you.
